short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In this game, you will experience the role of a dolphin in a presentation to the public.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In this game, you will experience the role of a dolphin in a presentation to the public. Pay close attention to your trainer, she will tell you what to do. Do everything right and earn lots of rewards!
